category.name: Rich Client

preference.name: Cfg0DefaultOptionFamilyNamespace
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default Family namespace property value for new Families created in the Variant Options view in the Product Configurator. Valid Values: The default value is "Teamcenter" and it can be any string value which will help to make that family unqiue.
